dict.acceptation: 没有的；不许的；一点儿也没有；决不是的；
不；否定，否认；反对票；否决票；

sent.orig: The key enzyme which produces NO, is also associated with the physiological functions of NO.
sent.trans: 一氧化氮合酶(NOS)为产生NO的限速酶，与NO的各种生理功能密切相关。

sent.orig: The low dosage equisetum increased the bioactivity of NOS, decrease the release of NO.
sent.trans: 木贼低剂量组的NOS活性较模型组增强，NO显著降低。 而木贼高剂量组的NOS和NO与模型组相比差异均无显著性。

sent.orig: Certificate of Quality No: Liaoning Experiment Animal No.
sent.trans: 实验动物合格证号，NO:辽实动字034号。

sent.orig: Conclusion After CPR, whole blood viscosity and plasma viscosity increased; TNF-α、NO concentration in serum increased also.
sent.trans: 结论CPR后兔全血粘度、血浆粘度增高，血清TNF-α、NO持续升高，巴曲酶可降低全血粘度和血浆粘度，抑制CPR后血清TNF-α、NO升高。

sent.orig: RCCS enhance the expression of eNOS and production of NO, thereby promote bone healing.
sent.trans: RCCS可上调eNOS mRNA水平，增加NO产量。 增加的NO能有效提高骨缺损修复效果。
